languages.text: "Нельзя калечить людей лишь потому, что это в ваших силах. Напротив, долг любого правителя — оберегать подданных".

traits.locale_text: "О чем ты? Нельзя калечить людей лишь потому, что они ниже тебя по статусу. Наоборот, мудрый правитель оберегает подданных".

languages.text: "A ruler cannot maim people just because it is in {mf|his|her} power to do so. On the contrary, it is the duty of every ruler to look after {mf|his|her} subjects."
languages.original_text: "Нельзя калечить людей лишь потому, что это в ваших силах. Напротив, долг любого правителя — оберегать подданных".

traits.locale_text: "One cannot maim people just because it is in their power to do so. On the contrary, it is the duty of every ruler to look after their subjects."
"One cannot maim people just because it is in their power to do so. On the contrary, it is the duty of every ruler to look after their subjects."
"A ruler cannot maim people just because it is in {mf|his|her} power to do so. On the contrary, it is the duty of every ruler to look after {mf|his|her} subjects."
"A ruler cannot maim people just because it is in {mf|his|her} power to do so. On the contrary, it is the duty of every ruler to look after {mf|his|her} subjects."
"A ruler cannot maim people just because it is in {mf|his|her} power to do so. On the contrary, it is the duty of every ruler to look after {mf|his|her} subjects."

languages.text: “身为统治者，不能仅仅因为拥有权力就肆意残害臣民。相反，好好照顾臣民才是每位统治者应尽的职责。”
languages.original_text: "A ruler cannot maim people just because it is in {mf|his|her} power to do so. On the contrary, it is the duty of every ruler to look after {mf|his|her} subjects."

traits.locale_text: “身为统治者，不能仅仅因为拥有权力就肆意残害臣民。相反，好好照顾臣民才是每位统治者应尽的职责。”

languages.text: «Un{mf||a} gobernante no debe mutilar a la gente solo porque esté en su poder. Al contrario, es deber de cada líder cuidar de sus súbditos».
languages.original_text: "A ruler cannot maim people just because it is in {mf|his|her} power to do so. On the contrary, it is the duty of every ruler to look after {mf|his|her} subjects."

traits.locale_text: «Un{mf||a} gobernante no debe mutilar a la gente solo porque esté en su poder. Al contrario, es deber de cada líder cuidar de sus súbditos».

languages.text: 「支配者は、それが己の権力下にあるからといって、人々を傷つけることはできない。それどころか、その臣民の面倒を見るのは、すべての支配者の義務なのだ」
languages.original_text: "A ruler cannot maim people just because it is in {mf|his|her} power to do so. On the contrary, it is the duty of every ruler to look after {mf|his|her} subjects."

traits.locale_text: 「支配者は、それが己の権力下にあるからといって、人々を傷つけることはできない。それどころか、その臣民の面倒を見るのは、すべての支配者の義務なのだ」

languages.text: "{mf|Ein Herrscher|Eine Herrscherin} darf niemanden verstümmeln, nur weil es in {mf|seiner|ihrer} Macht liegt. Im Gegenteil, es ist die Pflicht {mf|eines jeden Herrschers,|einer jeden Herrscherin}, sich um {mf|seine|ihre} Untertanen zu kümmern."
languages.original_text: "A ruler cannot maim people just because it is in {mf|his|her} power to do so. On the contrary, it is the duty of every ruler to look after {mf|his|her} subjects."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Ein Herrscher|Eine Herrscherin} darf niemanden verstümmeln, nur weil es in {mf|seiner|ihrer} Macht liegt. Im Gegenteil, es ist die Pflicht {mf|eines jeden Herrschers,|einer jeden Herrscherin}, sich um {mf|seine|ihre} Untertanen zu kümmern."

languages.text: « Un dirigeant ne peut pas mutiler son peuple pour la simple raison qu'il en a le pouvoir. Au contraire, son devoir lui dicte de veiller sur chacun de ses sujets. »
languages.original_text: "A ruler cannot maim people just because it is in {mf|his|her} power to do so. On the contrary, it is the duty of every ruler to look after {mf|his|her} subjects."

traits.locale_text: « Un dirigeant ne peut pas mutiler son peuple pour la simple raison qu'il en a le pouvoir. Au contraire, son devoir lui dicte de veiller sur chacun de ses sujets. »

languages.text: "Hükümdar dediğin, sırf gücü yetiyor diye milleti sakatlayamaz. Tam aksine, bir hükümdarın vazifelerinden biri de tebaasına göz kulak olmaktır."
languages.original_text: "A ruler cannot maim people just because it is in {mf|his|her} power to do so. On the contrary, it is the duty of every ruler to look after {mf|his|her} subjects."

traits.locale_text: "Hükümdar dediğin, sırf gücü yetiyor diye milleti sakatlayamaz. Tam aksine, bir hükümdarın vazifelerinden biri de tebaasına göz kulak olmaktır."
